options.content: This dashboards sums up useful information about the Calcique service, which is responsible for translating report computation requests to SQL.

panels.title: Max GRPC Compute Request Duration per Interval
Max GRPC ValidObjects Request Duration per Interval
Max GRPC LabelElements Request Duration per Interval
Max GRPC explain Request Duration per Interval

targets.expr:
sum((container_memory_rss{namespace="$namespace", container="$application", pod=~"$pod"} + container_memory_swap{namespace="$namespace", container="$application", pod=~"$pod"})) by (pod) - 
sum(jvm_memory_committed_bytes{application="$application", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod) - sum(jvm_buffer_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", pod=~"$pod", id="direct"}) by (pod)
